title: Looking to Buy: Yucky/ Low-Grade Hindu Portraits

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy: Yucky/ Low-Grade Hindu Portraits
posts.post_content:
Good evening,

I am seeking to buy low grade Hindu portraits. Both HoF // commons are great. Extra points for SLers. Paying competitive prices. Please let me know what you have available by either PM or email: [url]njdunkin1@gmail.com[/url]

I would also entertain rarer backs in low-grade, as Hindu is the rarest back in my current collection.

Kind regards,

N

One picked up these last couple weeks. Would be delighted with a few more.


Thank you,
N
I should have a perry lipe hindu coming back from SGC anyday. Interested?
Interested in buying one or two for Christmas. Thanks for looking.
